```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(usethis)

use_git_config(
      user.name = "Tormey Reimer", # will show on commits
      user.email = "tormeyreimer@gmail.com" # must match Github account
      )
```

## New R project

```{r exists in Git}
create_from_github(
   # copy from Github > Code > Local > Clone SSH 
   "git@github.com:stormeyseas/bigfishplayground.github.io.git", 
   destdir = "C:/RTempFiles", # will create a new project directory here
   protocol = "ssh" # or http
   )
```
